cat_size.name: Char. Size
cat_size.description:
**This directly affects your hunger.**
>>> `1`: Kit
`2`: Apprentice
`3`: Young Warrior
`4` Warrior
`5`: Large Warrior

strength.name: Strength
strength.description:
**How hard you hit!**
>>> How much you can lift, how muscular you are. Thunderclan is big and burly, so they tend to be stronger.

dexterity.name: Dexterity
dexterity.description:
**Skill. Finesse. Performing actions with a level of care and expertise!**
>>> Riverclan is lithe and graceful, so they have more dexterity. Their hand-paw coordination is uniquely honed for fishing!

constitution.name: Constitution
constitution.description:
**Toughness.**
>>> You can handle more pain, or even resist toxins or eat things most cats would struggle with. ShadowClan has a harsh territory, ShadowClan survives by eating things that would harm most cats!

speed.name: Speed
speed.description:
**How fast you react or run.**
>>> Windclan used to be known for this, but The Unforgiven seem to have followed their footsteps…

intelligence.name: Intelligence
intelligence.description:
**How smart you are.**
>>> You can make plans and think things through. The Unforgiven's hierarchy is well thought put, and their battle prowess intimidates the clans!

charisma.name: Charisma
charisma.description:
**Persuasiveness, Likability, how you present yourself.**
>>> How will you convince anyone if you can't even convince yourself? Thunderclan is full charismatic and well liked cats!

stalking.name: Stalking
stalking.description:
**Stealth, how silent you can slink through shadows, bushes or night.**
>>> ShadowClan is known for this!
